properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 9:07PM CST until January 24 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...

Patoka River near Princeton affecting Gibson County

.The Patoka River near Princeton is cresting close to 21.0 feet. It
will continue cresting into early Sunday, then begin to fall.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Patoka River near Princeton.
* until late Thursday night.
* At  8:45 PM Saturday the stage was 20.6 feet.
* Flood Stage is 18.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue cresting near 21.0 feet through
Sunday morning, then begin to fall.
* Impact...At 22.0 Feet...Flooding affects mainly farmland. Seasonal
camping trailers closest to the river become inundated.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
